channel.title: About the Bootstrapped Interviews category
channel.description:
People who are important to our community of software bootstrappers tell their stories here. You can:
- ask follow-up questions. We can't guarantee the interview subject will answer your questions though! - discuss the interview.
Remember to be respectful towards the people being interviewed!
We're aiming to add a new interview once every month.

item.title: About the Bootstrapped Interviews category
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
People who are important to our community of software bootstrappers tell their stories here. You can:

  • ask follow-up questions. We can’t guarantee the interview subject will answer your questions though!
  • discuss the interview.

Remember to be respectful towards the people being interviewed!

We’re aiming to add a new interview once every month.
